---
Song: pAdi vA
Film: mudivalla Arambam

Notes: s r2 g3 m1 p d2 n3 S

pAdi vA thendralE oru poovai thAlAttavE
gss  sp p    d sp pp  dn S   p  dp m gr

pAvai koNda koondhal vAsam kaNdu neeyum pArAttavE
r g   m  d  p   d    p p   r  g  m  d   pdp  g s

Stanza 1:
kAdhal nAL pArkkumA  iru dhEgam thOL sErkkumA  
dSS    S   S   S S   SS  SR Sn  d    n   R S

vAnam pArTHa boomi engum kOdai mEgam neer vArkkuma 
d n   S  G   R  G  R Rn  d n   S G   RG   R   S S

en vAsalil inimEl mAkkOlam
S  SRS n   dd d   dn dnnp

ini vAsanai veesum rAkkAlam 
SS  SRS n   d  d   dn dnnp

thEnil thOindha eeram kAyAmal 
m2dnS  nd   p   m2p   m g r

Stanza 2: (notes similar to Stanza 1)
poovE cheNdAnathu oru bOdhai uNdAnadhu 
sElai koNda sOlai onRu vAsal vandhAL ennAvadhu  
en pArvayil ivaLE pagal AnAL 
andha seethaiyum ivaLin nagal AnAL 
thEnil thOindha eeram kAyAmal
